attributes.action: consider the motion raised by Keith Vaz with regard to his support to erect a 7 to 9ft tall statue of Gandhi, as a emblem of culture, in the city of Leicester(Belgrave district)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition supports the erection of a statue of a key historical figure in a city of great culture and many faiths.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
